name: Jailbreak_Detection_Bypass
postprocess: Check for jailbreak artifacts being hidden or spoofed, verify system partition integrity, analyze runtime hooking libraries, correlate with privilege escalation attempts.
examples: Cydia installation check bypassed while jailbreak artifacts remain
Substrate dylib injection detected with runtime hooking
Sandbox escape attempt to access root filesystem
remediation: Update iOS to latest version, restore device from clean backup, avoid installing untrusted profiles, monitor for persistent jailbreak attempts, consider device replacement if persistent.
description: Detects attempts to bypass jailbreak detection mechanisms commonly used by advanced spyware.
